issue.title: scene_info does not reflect older changes to visuals

content.raw:
Hello!

It took a little longer than anticipated to get back to this issue, but attached above you'll find an alternative patch for persisting updates to Visual objects.
I've chosen the approach to check in Scene::Prerender() whether a model message contains visual sub-messages, and if yes, to append these to the visual messages that need to be processed.
That way, updates to visual properties can use the "~/model/modify" topic alone, as suggested after I submitted my original patch. 

Thank you!
With best regards,
Fabian Aichele
